trans-unit.source: Defines a segment of time that may contain child <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: Define um segmento de tempo que pode conter filho <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline"> </xref> objetos.

trans-unit.source: These child timelines become active according to their respective <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.BeginTime*> properties.
trans-unit.target: Esses cronogramas filho se tornar ativas de acordo com suas respectivas <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.BeginTime*>Propriedades.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.BeginTime*>

trans-unit.source: Also, child timelines are able to overlap (run in parallel) with each other.
trans-unit.target: Além disso, cronogramas filhos são capazes de se sobrepõem (executado em paralelo) com o outro.

trans-unit.source: ParallelTimeline objects can be children (nested inside) of a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>.
trans-unit.target: ParallelTimeline objetos podem ser filhos (aninhados) de <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>

trans-unit.source: This can provide better encapsulation of timing sequences in complex animations.
trans-unit.target: Isso pode fornecer melhor encapsulamento de sequências de tempo em animações complexas.

trans-unit.source: ParallelTimeline has its own <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.BeginTime%2A> property therefore all child timeline <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.BeginTime%2A> values are relative to the parent ParallelTimeline value for <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.BeginTime%2A>.
trans-unit.target: ParallelTimeline tem seu próprio <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.BeginTime%2A>propriedade, portanto, todos os filhos da linha do tempo <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.BeginTime%2A>são valores em relação ao valor de ParallelTimeline para <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.BeginTime%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.BeginTime%2A> pai</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.BeginTime%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.BeginTime%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.ParallelTimeline"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.ParallelTimeline"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.ParallelTimeline"></xref> class with the specified <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.BeginTime*>.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.ParallelTimeline"> </xref> classe com o <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.BeginTime*>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.BeginTime*> especificado

trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.ParallelTimeline"> </xref> classe com especificado <> </> *> e <> </> *>.

trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.ParallelTimeline"> </xref> classe com especificado <> </> *>, <> </> *> e <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.RepeatBehavior*>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.RepeatBehavior*>

trans-unit.target: The <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.BeginTime*> for this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimelineGroup"></xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.BeginTime*>

trans-unit.target: The <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.RepeatBehavior*> for this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimelineGroup"></xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.RepeatBehavior*>

trans-unit.source: Creates a modifiable clone of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.ParallelTimeline"></xref>, making deep copies of this object's values.
trans-unit.target: Cria um clone modificável <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.ParallelTimeline"> </xref>, fazendo cópias profundas dos valores do objeto.

trans-unit.source: When copying dependency properties, this method copies resource references and data bindings (but they might no longer resolve) but not animations or their current values.
trans-unit.target: Ao copiar as propriedades de dependência, esse método copia associações de dados e as referências de recurso (mas eles não podem resolver) mas não animações ou seus valores atuais.

trans-unit.source: This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
trans-unit.target: Esse método é usado para produzir cópias modificáveis de congelada <xref:System.Windows.Freezable>objetos (ou qualquer <xref:System.Windows.Freezable>objeto).</xref:System.Windows.Freezable> </xref:System.Windows.Freezable>

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: Para sua conveniência, este método sombreia a versão herdada com uma implementação fortemente tipada.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A modifiable clone of the current object.
trans-unit.target: Um clone modificável do objeto atual.

trans-unit.source: The cloned object's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property will be <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> even if the source's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property was <xref uid="langword_csharp_true." name="true." href=""></xref>
trans-unit.target: O objeto clonado <> </> *> propriedade será <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> mesmo se a fonte <> </> *> era de propriedade<xref uid="langword_csharp_true." name="true." href=""></xref>

trans-unit.source: Creates a modifiable clone of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.ParallelTimeline"></xref> object, making deep copies of this object's current values.
trans-unit.target: Cria um clone modificável <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.ParallelTimeline"> </xref> objeto, fazendo cópias profundas dos valores atuais deste objeto.

trans-unit.source: Resource references, data bindings, and animations are not copied, but their current values are.
trans-unit.target: Referências de recurso, associações de dados e animações não são copiadas, mas são os valores atuais.

trans-unit.source: This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
trans-unit.target: Esse método é usado para produzir cópias modificáveis de congelada <xref:System.Windows.Freezable>objetos (ou qualquer <xref:System.Windows.Freezable>objeto).</xref:System.Windows.Freezable> </xref:System.Windows.Freezable>

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: Para sua conveniência, este método sombreia a versão herdada com uma implementação fortemente tipada.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A modifiable clone of the current object.
trans-unit.target: Um clone modificável do objeto atual.

trans-unit.source: The cloned object's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property will be <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> even if the source's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property was <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O objeto clonado <> </> *> propriedade será <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> mesmo se a fonte <> </> *> propriedade <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of this <xref href="System.Windows.Freezable"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Cria uma nova instância deste <xref href="System.Windows.Freezable"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This method overrides the <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CreateInstanceCore%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Esse método substitui o <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CreateInstanceCore%2A>método.</xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CreateInstanceCore%2A>

trans-unit.source: The new <xref href="System.Windows.Freezable"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: The new <xref href="System.Windows.Freezable"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: Return the natural duration (duration of a single iteration) from a specified <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Retorna a duração natural (duração de uma única iteração) de um <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A natural duration is the period of a single iteration.
trans-unit.target: Uma duração natural é o período de uma única iteração.

trans-unit.source: If this method returns <xref:System.Windows.Duration.Automatic%2A> it means that the natural duration is unknown.
trans-unit.target: Se esse método retornar <xref:System.Windows.Duration.Automatic%2A>significa que a duração natural é desconhecida.</xref:System.Windows.Duration.Automatic%2A>

trans-unit.source: In this case, the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.NaturalDuration%2A> of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock> is determined by the author.
trans-unit.target: Nesse caso, o <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.NaturalDuration%2A>do <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock>é determinado pelo autor.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.NaturalDuration%2A>

trans-unit.source: For example, the duration of streaming media would be determined by the provider of the streaming media.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, a duração de streaming de mídia deve ser determinada pelo provedor de streaming de mídia.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock"></xref> to return the natural duration from.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock"> </xref> para retornar a duração natural de.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Duration"></xref> quantity representing the natural duration.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.Duration"> </xref> quantidade que representa a duração natural.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that specifies how this timeline will behave when one or more of its <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline"></xref> children slips.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que especifica o comportamento essa linha do tempo quando um ou mais dos seus <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline"> </xref> guias de filhos.

trans-unit.source: It is often desirable to synchronize animations and media.
trans-unit.target: Geralmente é desejável para sincronizar animações e mídia.

trans-unit.source: However, this is complicated by the fact that media playback can be delayed by loading or buffering making it difficult to reliably play an animation along with media.
trans-unit.target: No entanto, isso é complicado pelo fato de que a reprodução de mídia pode ser atrasada por carregar ou armazenamento em buffer, dificultando a confiável reproduzir uma animação junto com a mídia.

trans-unit.source: The SlipBehavior property is used to determine what happens when media and animations are played together.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade SlipBehavior é usada para determinar o que acontece quando a mídia e animações são executadas juntos.

trans-unit.source: A value of <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SlipBehavior> (default) specifies that animation timelines do not need to be synced and will play when specified regardless of the state of other media in the timeline.
trans-unit.target: Um valor de <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SlipBehavior>(padrão) Especifica que linhas de tempo da animação não precisam ser sincronizados e serão executado quando especificado, independentemente do estado de outras mídias na linha do tempo.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SlipBehavior>

trans-unit.source: A value of <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SlipBehavior> on the other hand, specifies that an animation will wait (slip) until media is ready to play.
trans-unit.target: Um valor de <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SlipBehavior>por outro lado, especifica que uma animação aguardará (guia) até que a mídia está pronta para reprodução.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SlipBehavior>

trans-unit.source: The diagrams below illustrate this behavior.
trans-unit.target: Os diagramas abaixo ilustram esse comportamento.

trans-unit.source: This <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> plays a video and an animation.
trans-unit.target: Isso <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>reproduz um vídeo e uma animação.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>

trans-unit.source: When SlipBehavior is set to <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SlipBehavior> and the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.Duration%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> is set to <xref:System.Windows.Duration.Automatic%2A>, the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> grows to play all media and animations.
trans-unit.target: Quando SlipBehavior está definido como <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SlipBehavior>e <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.Duration%2A>propriedade do <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>é definido como <xref:System.Windows.Duration.Automatic%2A>, o <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>aumenta para reproduzir todas as mídias e animações.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> </xref:System.Windows.Duration.Automatic%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.Duration%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SlipBehavior>

trans-unit.source: ![Diagram: Key for SlipBehavior diagram](~/add/media/slipbehaviorkey.png "Diagram: Key for SlipBehavior diagram") ![Diagram: SlipBehavior property value of Grow](~/add/media/slipbehaviorgrow1.png "Diagram: SlipBehavior property value of Grow") This <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> has a SlipBehavior of <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SlipBehavior> and a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.Duration%2A> of 5 seconds which gives media and animations 5 seconds to play regardless of how much they slip.
trans-unit.target: ![Diagrama: A chave para o Diagrama SlipBehavior](~/add/media/slipbehaviorkey.png "diagrama: chave para o Diagrama SlipBehavior")![diagrama: valor da propriedade SlipBehavior de expansão](~/add/media/slipbehaviorgrow1.png "diagrama: valor da propriedade SlipBehavior de expansão") isso <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>tem um SlipBehavior de <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SlipBehavior>e um <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.Duration%2A>de 5 segundos, que fornece 5 segundos de mídia e animações reproduzir independentemente de quanto de guia.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.Duration%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SlipBehavior> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>

trans-unit.source: ![Diagram: SlipBehavior property value of Grow](~/add/media/slipbehaviorgrow2.png "Diagram: SlipBehavior property value of Grow") This <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> has a SlipBehavior of <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SlipBehavior>.
trans-unit.target: ![Diagrama: Valor de propriedade SlipBehavior de expansão](~/add/media/slipbehaviorgrow2.png "diagrama: valor da propriedade SlipBehavior de expansão") este <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>tem um SlipBehavior de <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SlipBehavior>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SlipBehavior> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>

trans-unit.source: Note that the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.DoubleAnimation> (and any other non-media children of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>) does not progress unless the media timeline is also progressing.
trans-unit.target: Observe que o <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.DoubleAnimation>(e nenhum outro filho de mídia não o <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>) não progride, a menos que a linha do tempo de mídia também está em andamento.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.DoubleAnimation>

trans-unit.source: If the media takes a while to load, or if it is buffering, the animation will wait (slips) with it.
trans-unit.target: Se a mídia leva algum tempo para carregar ou se ele é armazenado em buffer, a animação aguardará (guias) com ele.

trans-unit.source: This allows animations to synchronize with a single media file.
trans-unit.target: Isso permite que as animações sincronizar com um único arquivo de mídia.

trans-unit.source: ![SlipBehavior diagram for media and animation](~/add/media/slipbehaviorslip1.png "SlipBehavior diagram for media and animation") This <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> has a SlipBehavior of <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SlipBehavior> and a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.Duration%2A> of 5 seconds.
trans-unit.target: ![Diagrama SlipBehavior para mídia e animação](~/add/media/slipbehaviorslip1.png "Diagrama SlipBehavior para mídia e animação") isso <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>tem um SlipBehavior de <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SlipBehavior>e um <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.Duration%2A>de 5 segundos.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.Duration%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SlipBehavior> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>

trans-unit.source: In this scenario, the media file and animation are guaranteed to play for 5 seconds.
trans-unit.target: Nesse cenário, o arquivo de mídia e animação são garantidos para reproduzir por 5 segundos.

trans-unit.source: ![Diagram: SlipBehavior property of a Storyboard](~/add/media/slipbehaviorslip2.png "Diagram: SlipBehavior property of a Storyboard") ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: ![Diagrama: Propriedade de SlipBehavior de um Storyboard](~/add/media/slipbehaviorslip2.png "diagrama: propriedade SlipBehavior de um Storyboard") # # informações de propriedade de dependência | | | |-|-| | Campo de identificador | | | Definir propriedades de metadados `true`| Nenhum |

trans-unit.source: A value that indicates how this timeline will behave when one or more of its <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline"></xref> children slips.
trans-unit.target: Um valor que indica como essa linha do tempo se comportará quando um ou mais dos seus <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline"> </xref> guias de filhos.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.SlipBehavior"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O valor padrão é <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.SlipBehavior"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ParallelTimeline.SlipBehavior*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifica o <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ParallelTimeline.SlipBehavior*>DependencyProperty.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ParallelTimeline.SlipBehavior*>

trans-unit.source: The identifier for the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ParallelTimeline.SlipBehavior%2A> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: O identificador para o <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ParallelTimeline.SlipBehavior%2A>DependencyProperty.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ParallelTimeline.SlipBehavior%2A>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.
